detail_desc: Fully lined bikini bottoms with a low waist and cutaway coverage at the back.

Fitted coat in soft bouclé with a zip down the front and patch pockets. Recycled polyester lining.
Fitted coat in soft bouclé with a zip down the front and patch pockets. Recycled polyester lining.
Short coat in woven fabric with no buttons. Side pockets with decorative flaps, and a detachable belt with D-rings at the waist. Lined.
Pre-tied, spotted bow tie with an adjustable strap and fastening. Width 11.5 cm.
Cropped jeans in washed, lightweight cotton denim with covered elastication at the waist and a fake fly. Wide, straight-cut legs with scalloped, hole embroidered hems.

Fancy dress set with an Alice band and hair elastic with hair extensions. Satin-covered Alice band with tulle veil and padded appliqués in the shape of ears and a glittery unicorn horn on top. Ears with shimmering reversible sequins at the front. Hair elastic with curly hair extensions. Length approx. 40 cm. No metal clips.
Set with an Alice band and a wand. Fabric-covered Alice band with a crown-shaped appliqué on top. Plastic wand decorated with a glittery star and thin satin ribbons.
Blouse in washed cotton denim with an all-over print. Grandad collar, button placket, a gathered yoke at the back and flutter sleeves.
Hat in a soft rib knit containing some wool.
Hat in a soft rib knit containing some wool.

Shirt in soft twill made from a viscose and linen blend with a mandarin collar, press-studs down the front and a wrapover button band at the top with a decorative tab. Detachable tie belt at the waist and long, wide sleeves with buttoned cuffs.

Shirt in soft twill made from a viscose and linen blend with a mandarin collar, press-studs down the front and a wrapover button band at the top with a decorative tab. Detachable tie belt at the waist and long, wide sleeves with buttoned cuffs.
Short, sleeveless nightslip in softly draping satin with a V-neck at the front and a slightly deeper, lace-trimmed V-neck at the back. Narrow, adjustable shoulder straps that cross at the back.
Hat in a soft, chunky knit with a wide turned-up hem.
Hat in a soft, chunky knit with a wide turned-up hem.
Bucket hat in a textured weave. Lined. Width of brim 5 cm.
Bucket hat in a textured weave. Lined. Width of brim 5 cm.

Sturdy shoulder bag in quilted imitation leather with a metal chain shoulder strap and flap with a decorative metal ring on the front and metal snap lock. Two-part compartment and a zipped inner compartment. Lined. Size approx. 9x15x23 cm.
Shoulder bag in grained imitation leather. One zipped inner compartment and a zip and detachable, adjustable shoulder strap at the top. Lined. Size 4.5x14x22.5 cm.
Bodysuits in soft cotton jersey with a scalloped trim around the neckline and lapped shoulders. Frills in a broderie anglaise weave over the shoulders and press-studs at the crotch.
Bodysuits in soft cotton jersey with a scalloped trim around the neckline and lapped shoulders. Frills in a broderie anglaise weave over the shoulders and press-studs at the crotch.
Set of two best friend necklaces made from thin metal chain, each with a pendant. Adjustable length 37-44 cm.
Grosgrain-covered Alice band with emojis on top.

Long dress in chiffon crêpe with smocking at the shoulders, cuffs and waist. V-neck with ties at the top, long puff sleeves and a flounce at the hem. Unlined.
Slippers in a soft knit with embroidery and appliqués. Faux fur linings and insoles and soft soles with anti-slip protectors.
Long-sleeved blouse in a softly draping viscose weave with a smocked stand-up collar, small opening with a button at the back of the neck and smocked cuffs.
Long-sleeved blouse in a softly draping viscose weave with a smocked stand-up collar, small opening with a button at the back of the neck and smocked cuffs.

Set with a blouse and pair of trousers in an airy weave. Blouse with an elasticated neckline, buttons down the front and short butterfly sleeves. Trousers with an elasticated waist, side pockets and elasticated hems.

Set with a blouse and pair of trousers in an airy weave. Blouse with an elasticated neckline, buttons down the front and short butterfly sleeves. Trousers with an elasticated waist, side pockets and elasticated hems.

Set with a dress and matching leggings in soft cotton. Dress in washed denim with a collar, buttons at the top, short butterfly sleeves and a chest pocket. Gathered seam at the waist and a flared skirt. Unlined. Leggings in jersey with an elasticated waist.

Blouse in airy, crinkled viscose with a V-neck, buttons down the front and long sleeves with elastication and a flounced trim at the cuffs. Flounced trim around the neckline and down the front. Unlined.

Blouse in airy, crinkled viscose with a V-neck, buttons down the front and long sleeves with elastication and a flounced trim at the cuffs. Flounced trim around the neckline and down the front. Unlined.

Set with a blouse and pair of shorts in an airy cotton weave. Sleeveless, flared blouse with buttons down the front and a yoke with a flounced trim that continues over the shoulders. Puff shorts with covered elastication and a decorative bow at the waist, pleats at the top and covered elastication around the hems.

Embossed metal earrings with a flat, round pendant with an embossed front and a thin hoop. Diameter approx. 3 cm, length 5 cm.

Padded dog jacket in a shimmering weave with a collar and opening for a leash at the back of the neck. Openings for the front legs and an adjustable hook and loop tab that fastens at the top. Narrow elastic straps for the back legs that help to keep the jacket in place. Fleece lining.

Hoodie in soft sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend. Double-layered, drawstring hood with a wrapover front, low dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
